42 #ifndef _TEUCHOS_SCALARTRAITS_CUDA_HPP_
43 #define _TEUCHOS_SCALARTRAITS_CUDA_HPP_
44 
49 #include "Teuchos_ScalarTraitsDecl.hpp"
50 
51 namespace Teuchos {
52 
53 template<>
54 struct ScalarTraits<int>
55 {
56  typedef int magnitudeType;
57  typedef int halfPrecision;
58  typedef int doublePrecision;
59  static const bool isComplex = false;
60  static const bool isOrdinal = true;
61  static const bool isComparable = true;
62  static const bool hasMachineParameters = false;
63  static inline __device__ __host__ magnitudeType magnitude(int a) { return (int)fabsf((float)a); }
64  static inline __device__ __host__ int zero() { return 0; }
65  static inline __device__ __host__ int one() { return 1; }
66  static inline __device__ __host__ int conjugate(int x) { return x; }
67  static inline __device__ __host__ int real(int x) { return x; }
68  static inline __device__ __host__ int imag(int) { return 0; }
69  static inline __device__ __host__ bool isnaninf(int) { return false; }
70  static inline __device__ __host__ int squareroot(int x) { return (int)sqrtf((float)x); } // perhaps this cast should be replaced by an explicit call like __float2int_rn
71  static inline __device__ __host__ int pow(int x, int y) { return (int)powf((float)x,(float)y); } // perhaps this cast should be replaced by an explicit call like __float2int_rn
72 };
73 
74 template<>
75 struct ScalarTraits<long int>
76 {
77  typedef long int magnitudeType;
78  typedef long int halfPrecision;
79  typedef long int doublePrecision;
80  static const bool isComplex = false;
81  static const bool isOrdinal = true;
82  static const bool isComparable = true;
83  static const bool hasMachineParameters = false;
84  // Not defined: eps(), sfmin(), base(), prec(), t(), rnd(), emin(), rmin(), emax(), rmax()
85  static inline __device__ __host__ magnitudeType magnitude(long int a) { return (long int)fabsf((float)a); }
86  static inline __device__ __host__ long int zero() { return 0; }
87  static inline __device__ __host__ long int one() { return 1; }
88  static inline __device__ __host__ long int conjugate(long int x) { return x; }
89  static inline __device__ __host__ long int real(long int x) { return x; }
90  static inline __device__ __host__ long int imag(long int) { return 0; }
91  static inline __device__ __host__ bool isnaninf(int) { return false; }
92  static inline __device__ __host__ long int squareroot(long int x) { return (long int)sqrtf((float)x); } // perhaps this cast should be replaced by an explicit call like __float2int_rn
93  static inline __device__ __host__ long int pow(long int x, long int y) { return (long int)powf((float)x,(float)y); } // perhaps this cast should be replaced by an explicit call like __float2int_rn
94 };
95 
96 #ifdef HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_FLOAT
97 template<>
98 struct ScalarTraits<float>
99 {
100  typedef float magnitudeType;
101  typedef float halfPrecision; // should become IEEE754-2008 binary16 or fp16 later, perhaps specified at configure according to architectural support
102 #ifdef HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_DOUBLE
103  typedef double doublePrecision;
104 #else
105  typedef float doublePrecision;
106 #endif
107  static const bool isComplex = false;
108  static const bool isOrdinal = false;
109  static const bool isComparable = true;
110  static const bool hasMachineParameters = false;
111  static inline __device__ __host__ magnitudeType magnitude(float a) { return fabsf(a); }
112  static inline __device__ __host__ float zero() { return(0.0f); }
113  static inline __device__ __host__ float one() { return(1.0f); }
114  static inline __device__ __host__ float conjugate(float x) { return(x); }
115  static inline __device__ __host__ float real(float x) { return x; }
116  static inline __device__ __host__ float imag(float) { return zero(); }
117  static inline __device__ __host__ bool isnaninf(float x) { return isnan(x) || isinf(x); }
118  static inline __device__ __host__ float squareroot(float x) { return sqrtf(x); }
119  static inline __device__ __host__ float pow(float x, float y) { return powf(x,y); }
120 };
121 #endif // HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_FLOAT
122 
123 #ifdef HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_DOUBLE
124 template<>
125 struct ScalarTraits<double>
126 {
127  typedef double magnitudeType;
128 #ifdef HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_FLOAT
129  typedef float halfPrecision;
130 #else
131  typedef double halfPrecision;
132 #endif
133  typedef double doublePrecision;
134  static const bool isComplex = false;
135  static const bool isOrdinal = false;
136  static const bool isComparable = true;
137  static const bool hasMachineParameters = false;
138  static inline __device__ __host__ magnitudeType magnitude(double a) { return abs(a); }
139  static inline __device__ __host__ double zero() { return(0.0); }
140  static inline __device__ __host__ double one() { return(1.0); }
141  static inline __device__ __host__ double conjugate(double x) { return(x); }
142  static inline __device__ __host__ double real(double x) { return x; }
143  static inline __device__ __host__ double imag(double) { return zero(); }
144  static inline __device__ __host__ bool isnaninf(double x) { return isnan(x) || isinf(x); }
145  static inline __device__ __host__ double squareroot(double x) { return sqrt(x); }
146  static inline __device__ __host__ double pow(double x, double y) { return pow(x,y); }
147 };
148 #endif // HAVE_KOKKOSCLASSIC_CUDA_DOUBLE
149 
150 } // Teuchos namespace
